message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly below its true worth.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This feels like a fair compromise.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $10,000 is a reasonable price for this product. I would like to stick to my original offer. I hope we can find a way to agree on this price.
